text: Martin Hladík (born 16 August 1953) is a Czech rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Prague
title: Martin Hladík
